hooks.command: echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE '\.(env|db)$' && echo 'BLOCKED: Cannot edit .env or .db files' && exit 1 || exit 0
echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE 'docs/architecture/ADR' && echo 'WARNING: Modifying ADR document - ensure PO has approved this change' || exit 0
echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -q '\.py$' && uv run ruff format --quiet $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS && uv run ruff check --fix --quiet $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null || true
echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -q '\.py$' && uv run mypy --no-error-summary $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null || true
for f in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; do echo "$f" | grep -qE 'configs?/.*\.yaml$' && python3 -c "import yaml; yaml.safe_load(open('$f'))" 2>&1 | head -5 || true; done
